title: Heirloom Polki Pendant with Emerald Drops
materials: Natural Emeralds. Crafted with traditional Hyderabadi polish for an authentic antique finish.
features: Features a central large uncut Polki diamond surrounded by smaller Polki diamonds in a floral halo setting. The pendant boasts cascading rows of Polki diamonds culminating in three drop-shaped emeralds, adding a touch of regal elegance. Traditional golusu (chain) detailing complements the pendant's timeless charm.
colors: The predominant color scheme is a classic combination of golden yellow (from the 22K gold)
and vibrant green (from the emeralds). This combination is considered auspicious in Telugu traditions.
occasions: and special occasions. A stunning statement piece for bridal wear (pellikuturu) or to add a touch of heritage to contemporary ensembles. Ideal for Seemantham
description: This heirloom-quality pendant is a celebration of South Indian craftsmanship and heritage. The use of uncut Polki diamonds and natural emeralds lends a unique, timeless appeal. Its sturdy construction ensures durability, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection for generations to come. Polki jewelry symbolizes prosperity and auspicious beginnings, making it a meaningful gift or personal investment.
